packages.name: Antennas
packages.author: Famiy
packages.description:
A pennant that features Psyonix branding and flags that feature various club football brandings.

Includes:

  • Bundesliga
    • Bayern
    • Dortmund
    • Frankfurt
    • Leverkusen
    • Schalke


  • Premier League
    • Chelsea
    • Liverpool
    • Man City
    • Man United
    • Tottenham


  • Eredevisie
    • Ajax
    • AZ Alkmaar
    • Feyenoord
    • PSV
    • Utrecht


  • La Liga
    • Atletico
    • Barcelona
    • Real Betis
    • Real Madrid
    • Valencia


  • Ligue 1
    • Lyonnais
    • Marseille
    • Monaco
    • PSG


  • Serie A
    • AC Milan
    • AS Roma
    • Inter
    • Juventus
    • Lazio
    • Napoli
